ygData.subject: Some questions :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, I have a few questions, some of which I think I know the answers to. (hopefully someone can shed a new light on them for me). 1. In what ways
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone,

I have a few questions, some of which I think I know the answers to. (hopefully someone can shed a new light on them for me).

1. In what ways does CHA effect our characters? A GM hinted around that it effects some spells in some way or another, but she would not confirm anything...

2. What effects the Duration of a spell? anyone every notice that if a level 14 druid SOW's you that it doesn't last no where near as long as if a level 30 or so does it?

3. Does anyone know what determines our "Hit-percentages" at higher levels when transformed (using an illusion) say into a Fire Ele? (or any illusion where we can become a Mob of some type) is it our 2H blunt that determines hit or miss? Hand-to-hand? etc...

4. Does anyone know of any illusion spells that we may aquire besides the Race type ones (Dwarf, Human, High Elf, Troll, etc..) and these I have list - (Tree, Earth Ele, Skeleton, Air Ele, Water Ele, Fire Ele, Dry Bone, Spirit Wolf) So do you know of any that I have not listed?

Well I think I have asked enough questions for today, I sure hope to get some good feedback and would like to thank you ahead of time..

Narcos -Lvl 19 - The Rathe- (aka Verrants Secret Test Server) haha J/K..stated for CYA purposes....
